pages.text: Due to the content creator's love for tacos and a restaurant bearing its name, a few things have been created in this update reflecting the greatness that is the taco itself.

pages.title: It's Raining Tacos!
pages.text: From a taco bell to the ability to now make tacos, enjoy the boost that a taco brings.
To craft a taco bell is relatively easy, and if the bell is rung once a day at the proper time, the bell provides a free taco! Who doesn't love that?

pages.title: Taco Bell Recipe
pages.string: At a crafting table, use the recipe provided.

pages.text: To make a good taco with the benefits of speed and regeneration requires a significant amount of work: $(li)Cheese needs to be made.$(li)Lettuce needs to be grown.$(li)Steak is required (sorry no chicken tacos yet)$(li)tortillas need to be cooked. $(br)The labor is worth it with a food source that gives you healing and a temporary speed boost due to predicted methane levels.

pages.title: Taco Recipe
pages.string: At a crafting table, use the recipe provided.

pages.text: Lettuce is a new crop that needs to be farmed in the creation of a taco. To get lettuce seeds, you have a chance of finding one every time you punch grass and get grass seeds. It makes no real sense, but hey, Minecraft doesn't either.

pages.title: Lettuce Seeds
pages.text: Farm your lettuce like other plants.
Cheese is made in a unique way. Get your cow farm set and put a bucket of milk in a furnace. Don't worry, you'll get your bucket back.

pages.title: Cheese For Tacos
pages.text: It don't go down easy if it ain't cheesy.
Tortillas are made easily with some bread. Place your bread in a furnace and you have a tortilla. Hey, it is Minecraft. We make this up as we go.
